description: The Request for Proposal filed by Defence Research and Development Canada (DRDC), for the acquisition of a simultaneous four (4)-axis wire electrical discharge machine located in Quebec, Canada. This acquisition meeting all requirements and conditions detailed in Annex A.
full_summary:
**Contract Notice**

**Title:** W7701-237707 - Simultaneous Four-Axis Wire Electrical Discharge Machine

**Reference Number:** WS4011389896-Doc4011447676

**Amendment:** 7

**Solicitation Number:** WS4011389896

**Publication Date:** 2023-05-16

**Tender Closing Date:** 2023-07-28 @ 14:00 EDT

**Amendment Date:** 2023-07-12

**Expected Contract Start Date:** 2023-10-13

**Expected Contract End Date:** 2025-02-28

**Tender Status:** Expiré (Expired)

**Industry Classification:** 24000000 - Material Handling and Conditioning Machinery and their Accessories and Supplies

**Procurement Category:** Government of Canada (GD)

**Request Type:** Request for Proposal (Demande de propositions)

**Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding (Concurrentielle - Invitation ouverte à soumissionner)

**Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price (Prix le plus bas)

**Trade Agreements:** Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement (Accord de libre-échange Canada-Colombie) and several others

**Regions of Opportunity:** None specified

**Regions of Delivery:** Québec (Québec, Canada)

**Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (SPAC/PSPC)

**Contracting Entity Address:** 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada

**End User Entity:** Defence Research and Development Canada (DRDC) 

**End User Entity Address:** 400 Cumberland Street, Ottawa, Ontario, K1N 1J8, Canada

**Contact Information:**
Annie Deslauriers, Representing SPAC/PSPC, Phone: Not available. Email: annie.deslauriers@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Notice URL:** http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16291018?extsite=MTYyOTEwMThfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg##

**Tender Description:** Defence Research and Development Canada (DRDC) - Valcartier Research Centre is soliciting proposals for the acquisition of a simultaneous four-axis wire electrical discharge machine located in Québec, Canada. The deliverables include the machine, installation, start-up, and training
